attributes.additional_details: Selcuk & Leanne have been together for 3 years and have 2 children together , Selcuk applied for a holiday visa for the birth of his daughter and was refused it because they didnt think he would return to Turkey.. They didnt know then that they should have applied for a settlement visa and are now in the process of doing so.. they have already had 13 months apart and of Leanne going back and forwards to Turkey for the children to see their Dad..Hopefully Selcuk will be granted the settlemnt visa this time so they can be a FAMILY...
